title: Bloomberg Markets: Schwartz on How Employers Retain Top Talent
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Schwartz on How Employers Retain Top Talent
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jake Schwartz Chief Executive Officer General Assembly Space Inc Discussing tech jobs, automation and how companies can retain talent in a competitive job market.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
